scripts.publish-api-prod: npm run clean-dist-api && cd DerpCode.API && dotnet publish -c Release -o dist && cp ../CI/DerpCode.API.service dist/
scripts.build-docker-js-vm: ssh azure-vm "cd /var/www/html/APIs/Docker/JavaScript && sudo docker build -t code-executor-javascript ."
scripts.build-docker-ts-vm: ssh azure-vm "cd /var/www/html/APIs/Docker/TypeScript && sudo docker build -t code-executor-typescript ."
scripts.build-docker-csharp-vm: ssh azure-vm "cd /var/www/html/APIs/Docker/CSharp && sudo docker build -t code-executor-csharp ."
scripts.build-docker-rs-vm: ssh azure-vm "cd /var/www/html/APIs/Docker/Rust && sudo docker build -t code-executor-rust ."
scripts.docker-prune-vm: ssh azure-vm "sudo docker container prune -f; sudo docker image prune -f"
scripts.build-docker-vm: npm run build-docker-js-vm && npm run build-docker-ts-vm && npm run build-docker-csharp-vm && npm run docker-prune-vm
scripts.restart-vm-service: ssh azure-vm "sudo systemctl stop DerpCode.API.service; sudo systemctl enable DerpCode.API.service; sudo systemctl start DerpCode.API.service; sudo systemctl daemon-reload"
scripts.deploy-api-to-vm: npm run clean-vm && npm run copy-dist-to-vm && npm run copy-service-file-to-vm && npm run install-service-file-vm && npm run restart-vm-service
scripts.build-and-deploy-api-to-vm: npm run publish-api-prod && npm run deploy-api-to-vm
